title: Acupuncture Therapy in Syracuse with Dr. Ewa Lukasik
cleaned_text: About Ewa Welcome At Acupuncture Wellness, Dr. Lukasik offers: Chinese five-element acupuncture, Nambudripad Allergy Elimination Technique (N.A.E.T.), energy therapy, pain relief, treatment of addiction, and detoxification. She is also skilled in distance healing. She can spend more time and go even deeper with distance divine energy healing than she can during an office visit.While you are in the comfort of your own home, this powerful therapy is used for physical healing and to transform, heal, and awaken the wisdom of your heart. Acupuncture Acupuncture is an ancient healing art used for thousands of years and approved by the AMA for decades to bring harmony and balance to individuals, thus releasing blockages which cause fatigue, pain, and dysfunction which can lead to serious illnesses. Acupuncture is also preventive medicine
